title: Project 1
shortDescription: A cool project I built using React.
detailedDescription: This is a more in-depth explanation of Project 1. It was built using React, JavaScript, and CSS. I faced several challenges such as state management and optimizing performance. I also used hooks and functional components.

title: Project 2
shortDescription: A fun app for managing tasks efficiently.
detailedDescription: Project 2 is a task management app that I built using React for the frontend and Node.js for the backend. It has user authentication, real-time updates, and a responsive UI. This project helped me learn more about building full-stack applications.
